Package app.security.util.constant

Class SecretLength

java.lang.Object
app.util.AbstractConstant
app.security.util.constant.SecretLength
public class SecretLength
extends AbstractConstant
Constants class containing lengths of the secret keys, created by the AbstractSecretFactory children
